Swiss authorities say Uber drivers should treated as employees

  • Travel
  • Donald Ramos
  • March 21, 2019
  • 3,005

  • Freelance Remote Conf

  • Agency Management Institute
2:40: Building an Agency
  • Adding employees
  • Traditional vs 1099 model
7:30: Where youâ€™re spending your time
  • Running the business vs. doing your craft
  • Risks of agency vs. risks of freelancing

11:00: Financial metrics
  • 55% salaries, 25% overhead, 20% profit

  • SEM
